name: Workflow Orchestrator meta-plan Template
description: Guides meta-plan for this repository: decide what needs planning, which templates apply, and which artifacts to create before execution.
steps: Summarize the operator request and confirm scope, non-goals, and constraints in meta-plan: <Your Title Here>.
Identify which workflow folders (plans/, reports/, scripts/, states/) the work WILL touch and record rationale.
Select all relevant ingestion, planning, processing, output, verify, and meta-plan templates from .pipeline-x/templates/processing/template-processing-7b-allowed-template-registry-catalog-v1.json.
Enumerate key risks, guardrails, and environment constraints (Windows + WSL, no-source-code unless explicitly requested).
Define the concrete planning artifacts to create (plan markdown, state entries, reports) and their naming patterns.
Specify acceptance checks for the downstream plan and record where operator approval MUST be captured before execution.
acceptance: A meta-plan markdown file MUST exist under plans/plan-{2-byte-id}-{very-nice-five-word-slug}.md with sections for Context, Scope, Non-goals, Constraints, Risks, and Next Steps.
The meta-plan MUST list selected templates by id and path from .pipeline-x/templates/processing/template-processing-7b-allowed-template-registry-catalog-v1.json.
Planned artifacts and naming patterns MUST be documented so the next planning phase can proceed deterministically.
Operator approval status for the meta-plan MUST be recorded before any execution work that depends on the plan starts.
